title: Did the Boy Scouts Lose 425,000 Members Because of a Gender-Inclusive Name Change?
subtitle: The exact reasons behind the Mormon Church's decision to cut ties with the Boy Scouts of America are still somewhat opaque.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Boy Scouts of America lost 425,000 members in May 2018, in response to a decision to integrate more girls into the organization, and to give the "Boy Scouts" program a new, gender-neutral name.
